alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Searcy, northwestern Van Buren and northeastern Pope Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 802 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dabney, or 21 miles west of Clinton, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marshall... Marsena... Kay... Witts Spring... Rocky Hill... Dabney... Point Peter... Smyrna... Eula... Bohannon... Woolum... Imo... Elberta... Watts... Leslie... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Canaan... Rupert... Tilly... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
